item.title: About
item.description:
Hello!

  • I’m abel.
  • I’m a master’s student in Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science and Technology.
  • My research focuses on Multi-Modal Information Extraction, like Visual Relation Detection.
  • My research skill is still relatively poor now.😅
  • Thank you for visiting.

Wanna know more? Contact me:

  • Github
  • Email

教育背景 (Education)：

Master Student（硕士）

2022.09 - 2025.06

  • 东北大学 (Northeastern University)
  • 计算机科学与技术 (Computer Science)
  • GPA Top 4%
  • 东北大学校长奖学金 (Presidential Scholarship)
  • 东北大学一等奖学金 (First-class Scholarship)
  • 东北大学优秀研究生 (Outstanding Graduate Student)

Undergraduate (本科)

2018.09 - 2022.06

  • 东北大学 (Northeastern University)
  • 物联网工程 (Internet of Things)
  • GPA Top 6%
  • 东北大学优秀毕业生 (Outstanding Undergraduate Graduates)
  • 东北大学优秀学生干部 (Outstanding Student Leader)

实习经历 (Internship)：

#1

2023.03 - 2023.06

  • 中国电信股份有限公司北京研究院 (China Telecom)
  • 算法实习生 (NLP Intern)

#2

2023.07 - 2023.09

  • 影石Insta360
  • 深度学习算法实习生 (Deep Learning Intern)

科研经历 (Research)

TechGPT

2023.04 - 2023.06

  • TechGPT大模型 (LLM, Large Language Model)
  • 主要开发者 (Key Developer)
  • TechGPT Online
  • TechGPT (GitHub)
  • TechGPT (Hugging Face)

Paper

  • RTF: Region-based Table Filling Method for Relational Triple Extraction. (2023, the Second Author)
  • TechGPT2.0: A large language model project to solve the task of knowledge graph construction. (2024, the Co-first Author)
  • QEOT: Query-based Transformer Model for Multimodal Entity-Object Relational Triple Extraction. (2024, the First Author, Under Rereview)
